name: datastax-ops
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is maintained by DataStax and available to mutual DataStax and Mesosphere customers (eval and production) and prospects (eval) .

Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 6.5 CPU | 23040 MB MEM | 32000MB Disk

More specifically, each instance type requires:

DSE node: 3 instances | 2.5 CPU | 12500 MB MEM | 1 10240MB Disk

OpsCenter node: 1 instance | 2 CPU | 6000 MB MEM | 1 10240 MB Disk

Contact Mesosphere and DataStax before deploying this service to ensure proper support channels are made available. Contact your rep at either company or techpartner@datastax.com. By using this service you agree to the license terms here: https://gist.github.com/012345/d1df9d43a0dfaa49e628c7bfbc9ffb52

Versions: DataStax Enterprise 5.1.2 (Standard and Max) & OpsCenter 6.1.2
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Datastax Enterprise OpsCenter is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/dse/
	Issues: https://www.datastax.com/contactus
postUninstallNotes: DC/OS Datastax Enterprise OpsCenter has been uninstalled.
